message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale, priced at $10000. It's a one-time opportunity to own something truly special.  This is my first sale, so you have the chance to be the first to own a piece of quality. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a product without any information about its quality. Since there's no sales history yet, I'm unable to assess the reliability of your product. Perhaps if you offered a refund option in case the product turns out to be low quality, I would be more interested.
